name: The Pasture
description: The Pasture gives you a truly innovative gameplay and experimental possibilities that will allow you to experience yourself as a different character – a member of mysterious modern art elite.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 or 8.1, 10 – 32/64 bit version Processor: Intel/AMD 2.6+ Ghz Dual Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia: GTX 295, 480, 570, 660 / ATI: HD 4870 X2, 6970, 7850, R7 265 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 , 8 or 8.1, 10 – 32/64 bit version Processor: Intel/AMD 3.0+ Ghz Quad Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia: GTX 580, GTX 670, GTX 960 / ATI: HD 5970, 7870 LE (XT), 7950, 280, 285 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
